articles.title: Airtel takes on growth leadership mantle, as Reliance Jio slows down - Mint
articles.description: On a year-on-year basis, Airtel’s India mobile revenues have grown by 32.4% and its Ebitda has jumped 61%. This, of course, comes on the back of the tariff hikes taken last December, and an improvement in subscriber mix.
